1:
May God be merciful to us and bless us\q and cause his face to shine on us
\qs Selah\qs*
\q
2:
so that your ways may be known on earth,\q your salvation among all nations.


\q
3:
Let the peoples praise you, God;\q let all the peoples praise you.
\q
4:
Oh, let the nations be glad and sing for joy,\q for you will judge the peoples with justice
\q and govern the nations on earth.
\qs Selah\qs*


\q
5:
Let the peoples praise you, God;\q let all the peoples praise you.
\q
6:
The earth has yielded its harvest\q and God, our God, has blessed us.


\q
7: God has blessed us,\q and all the ends of the earth honor him.
